title: England's miserie, and remedie in a judicious letter from an utter-barrister to his speciall friend, concerning Leiutenant [sic] Col. Lilburn's imprisonment in Newgate, Sept: 1645.
author: Utter-Barrister.
notes: Variously attributed to Richard Overton, John Lilburne, John Wildman and Edward Sexby.
Annotation on Thomason copy: between Sept: and 1645: "14" "7br 19th" [i.e. September 19th]; "Lilburne's owne".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
